get.summary: Parameters queries the parameters of the module.
ListOperatorAuthorizations returns operator authorizations matching optional filters.

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: authority filters by the authority group that granted the authorization.

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: operator filters by the operator account that received the authorization.

parameters.name: response_max_size
parameters.description: response_max_size limits the number of results. Must be 1-1024, defaults to 64.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

authority.description: authority is the group granting the authorization.

operator.description: operator is the account receiving the authorization.

msg_types.description: msg_types is the list of module message types this authorization applies to.

spend_limit.description:
spend_limit is the maximum amount of funds that the grantee is allowed to
spend as a direct consequence of executing authorized messages.

fee_spend_limit.description:
fee_spend_limit is the maximum total amount of fees that can be paid using
this authorization.

expiration.description:
expiration is the timestamp after which the authorization is no longer
valid.

period.description: period is the reset period for spend_limit and fee_spend_limit.

verana.de.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

verana.de.v1.QueryListOperatorAuthorizat.description:
QueryListOperatorAuthorizationsResponse is the response type for the
Query/ListOperatorAuthorizations RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

verana.de.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
